153  template<typename T, size_t R, size_t C>
154  void toMatrix(PyObject* incoming, Matrix<T, R, C>& outMatrix) const {
155  if (isTuple(incoming)) {
156  for (size_t i = 0; i < C; i++) {
157  // PyTyple_GetItem does not call INCREF (unlike many functions that return an item)
158  // So NO reference decrementing
159  PyObject* column = PyTuple_GetItem(incoming, i);
160  toVec(column, outMatrix.column(i));
161  }
162  }
163  else {
164  if (isList(incoming)) {
165  for (size_t i = 0; i < C; i++) {
166  PyObject *column = PyList_GetItem(incoming, i);
167  toVec(column, outMatrix.column(i));
168  }
169  }
170  else {
171  Logger::Throw("Passed PyObject pointer was not a list or tuple!");
172  }
173  }
174  }
175 
177  template<typename T, size_t N>
178  void toVec(const py::object& incoming, Vector<T, N>& outVec) const {
179  return toVec(incoming.ptr(), outVec);
180  }
181  template<typename T, size_t N>
182  void toVec(PyObject* incoming, Vector<T, N>& outVec) const {
183  if (isTuple(incoming)) {
184  for (size_t i = 0; i < N; i++) {
185  // PyTyple_GetItem does not call INCREF (unlike many functions that return an item)
186  // So NO reference decrementing
187  PyObject *value = PyTuple_GetItem(incoming, i);
188  outVec[i] = cType<T>(value);
189  }
190  }
191  else {
192  if (isList(incoming)) {
193  for (size_t i = 0; i < N; i++) {
194  PyObject *value = PyList_GetItem(incoming, i);
195  outVec[i] = cType<T>(value);
196  }
197  }
198  else {
199  Logger::Throw("Passed PyObject pointer was not a list or tuple!");
200  }
201  }
202  }
203 
204  template<typename T>
205  std::vector<std::vector<T>> toVecOfVec(PyObject* incoming) const {
206  std::vector<std::vector<T>> data;
207  if (isTuple(incoming)) {
208  Py_ssize_t size = PyTuple_Size(incoming);
209  data.reserve(size);
210  for (Py_ssize_t i = 0; i < size; i++) {
211  // PyTyple_GetItem does not call INCREF (unlike many functions that return an item)
212  // So NO reference decrementing
213  PyObject *value = PyTuple_GetItem(incoming, i);
214  Vec::EmplaceBack(data, toVec<T>(value));
215  }
216  }
217  else {
218  if (isList(incoming)) {
219  Py_ssize_t size = PyList_Size(incoming);
220  data.reserve(size);
221  for (Py_ssize_t i = 0; i < size; i++) {
222  PyObject *value = PyList_GetItem(incoming, i);
223  Vec::EmplaceBack(data, toVec<T>(value));
224  }
225  }
226  else {
227  Logger::Throw("Passed PyObject pointer was not a list or tuple!");
228  }
229  }
230  return data;
231  }
232 
234  template<typename T>
235  std::vector<T> toVec(PyObject* incoming) const {
236  std::vector<T> data;
237  if (isTuple(incoming)) {
238  Py_ssize_t size = PyTuple_Size(incoming);
239  data.reserve(size);
240  for (Py_ssize_t i = 0; i < size; i++) {
241  // PyTyple_GetItem does not call INCREF (unlike many functions that return an item)
242  // So NO reference decrementing
243  PyObject *value = PyTuple_GetItem(incoming, i);
244  Vec::EmplaceBack(data, cType<T>(value));
245  }
246  }
247  else {
248  if (isList(incoming)) {
249  Py_ssize_t size = PyList_Size(incoming);
250  data.reserve(size);
251  for (Py_ssize_t i = 0; i < size; i++) {
252  PyObject *value = PyList_GetItem(incoming, i);
253  Vec::EmplaceBack(data, cType<T>(value));
254  }
255  }
256  else {
257  Logger::Throw("Passed PyObject pointer was not a list or tuple!");
258  }
259  }
260  return data;
261  }
262  template<typename T>
263  std::vector<T> toVec(const py::object& incoming) const {
264  return toVec<T>(incoming.ptr());
265  }

290  template<typename T>
291  T cType(PyObject* o) const = delete;
292 
293  template <>
294  GString cType<GString>(PyObject* o) const {
295  PyObject* rep = PyObject_Repr(o);
296  const char * s = PyUnicode_AsUTF8(rep);
297  if (s == NULL) {
298  printAndClearErrors();
299  Logger::Throw("Error, string conversion failed");
300  }
301 
302  GString out(s);
303  Py_XDECREF(rep);
304  return out;
305  }
306 
307  template<>
308  double cType<double>(PyObject* o) const {
309  return PyFloat_AsDouble(o);
310  }
311 
312  template<>
313  float cType<float>(PyObject* o) const {
314  return PyFloat_AsDouble(o);
315  }
316 
317  template<>
318  int cType<int>(PyObject* o) const {
319  return int(PyLong_AS_LONG(o));
320  }
